sentences.en: America lend-leased many naval crafts allied countries during the World War Ⅱ.
sentences.cn: 二战时，美国根据租借法案向盟国提供了许多海军舰只。

sentences.en: He accepted a com-mission as a naval officer.
sentences.cn: 他接受任命成为一名海军军官。

sentences.en: He accepted a commission as a naval officer.
sentences.cn: 他接受任命成为一名海军军官。

sentences.en: He had been a naval ensign stationed off Cuba.
sentences.cn: 他是派驻古巴的海军少尉。

sentences.en: He took part in a great naval battle.
He was the senior serving naval officer.
sentences.cn: 他那时是现役海军高级军官。

sentences.en: I was a naval officer, lieutenant junior grade.
sentences.cn: 我是一名海军中尉军官。

sentences.en: In a naval battle your aim is to sink the enemy's ship.
sentences.cn: 在海战中目标就是击沉敌船。

sentences.en: Italy wanted naval parity with France.
sentences.cn: 意大利想要在海军实力上与法国平起平坐。

sentences.en: The boat was operated by two naval ratings in dress whites.
sentences.cn: 船由两个穿着白色礼服的水兵驾驶.

sentences.en: The harbour is an important naval base.
sentences.cn: 该港是一个重要的海军基地。

sentences.en: The naval high command's response to these developments is rather curious.
sentences.cn: 海军最高指挥部对这些进展的回应十分反常。

sentences.en: The spectacle of the former naval officers washing their dirty linen in public was distinctly embarrassing.
sentences.cn: 前海军官员们自揭伤疤的做法显然非常令人尴尬。

sentences.en: The troops are reported to have advanced nearly four miles since they were landed from naval craft on Sunday evening.
sentences.cn: 据报道，部队自周日晚离开海军军舰登陆后已经挺进了将近4英里。

sentences.en: They sent naval forces to protect merchant shipping.
sentences.cn: 他们派出了海军保护商船。

sentences.en: Will the aid of naval gunfire, the ground troops regained the initiative.
sentences.cn: 我们的地面部队,在海军炮火掩护下, 遂将主动权夺回.

造船学，造船工程；海洋建筑工程，海事工程

trans.tran_en: relating to the navy or used by the navy
